mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTQNA VALUES( PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, 0, PRODUCT_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0, #{pid} )
